item.title: 美联储会议前黄金将连续第三个月上涨
item.description: 由于央行和避风港需求强劲，黄金有望连续第三个月上涨，因为焦点转向了本周的美联储利率决策会议，预计决策者将在会上采取鹰派基调。【原文：Gold was on track for a third straight month of gains due to strong central bank and haven demand, as the focus turned to this week’s Federal Reserve rate-decision meeting at which policymakers are expected to strike a hawkish tone.】

item.title: Blackstone 正在洽谈收购新加坡、首尔的德威学校
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 即将达成一项交易，以约 6 亿美元的价格收购德威国际学院的部分亚洲资产，这凸显出收购公司对教育行业的持续青睐。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to buy some of Dulwich College International’s Asian assets for about $600 million, according to people with knowledge of the matter, underscoring the continued appetite of buyout firms in the education sector.】

item.title: 巴克莱称正在从美国公司手中赢得亚洲银行业务
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，在过去的一年里，该公司招聘了近十名高级销售和交易人员，以加快各业务线的建设，从而从一些美国竞争对手手中抢占了亚洲市场份额。【原文：Barclays Plc says it’s gaining market share in Asia from some US rivals after it hired almost a dozen senior sales and trading staff in the past year to accelerate the buildout of various business lines.】

item.title: 住友商事股价创 2020 年以来最大涨幅，原因是报告了埃利奥特的持股情况
item.description: 据说激进投资者埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management Corp.）已 "大量 "持有这家日本贸易公司的股份，住友商事公司（Sumitomo Corp.【原文：Sumitomo Corp. shares surged by the most since August 2020 after activist investor Elliott Management Corp. was said to have built a “large” stake in the Japanese trading house.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行（SocGen）亚洲交易员在期权下注未被察觉后出局
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）发现一批未被公司风险管理系统发现的高风险押注后，香港的一对交易员已经离职。【原文：A pair of traders in Hong Kong have left Societe Generale SA after the French bank discovered a batch of risky bets that went undetected by the firm’s risk-management systems, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好摩根大通担心去年夏天的股灾会重演习近平五年来首次访问欧盟。埃隆-马斯克的中国之行收获颇丰。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. JPMorgan fears a repeat of last summer’s stock rout. Xi Jinping to visit the European Union for the first time in five years. Elon Musk’s China visit pays off. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 已经疲软的人民币如今面临 790 亿美元的股息压力
item.description: 未来几个月，中国企业的大笔股息派发将对本已疲软的人民币造成压力。【原文：A massive chunk of dividend payouts by Chinese companies is set to weigh on the already weakened yuan in coming months.】

item.title: 中东停火谈判削弱风险溢价，石油保持跌势
item.description: 由于有关中东可能停火的讨论降低了原油的风险溢价，石油创下了近两周来的最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held its biggest drop in almost two weeks as discussions on a possible cease-fire in the Middle East reduced the risk premium for crude.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随美国股市走高，日本股市领涨：市场综述
item.description: 在 "华丽七雄 "大型科技公司引领的财报季强劲开局提振华尔街之后，亚洲股市周二将高开。【原文：Asian stocks were set to open higher Tuesday after Wall Street was bolstered by a strong start to the earnings season led by the “Magnificent Seven” big-tech companies.】

item.title: 日本股市重新开盘，日元波动率飙升
item.description: 日本股市将从假期中重新开盘，交易员们将首次有机会对周一日元汇率的波动做出反应。【原文：Japan’s stock market will reopen from a holiday, giving traders their first chance to react to Monday’s volatile yen session that sparked suspicion the nation’s government intervened to support the currency.】

item.title: 中国央行希望停止而非加入债券购买狂潮
item.description: 中国市场盛传中央银行即将开始购买政府债券。中国人民银行本身也在努力解决一个不同的问题：似乎有太多其他人急于购买国债。【原文：Chinese markets are abuzz with talk that the central bank is about to start buying government bonds. The People’s Bank of China itself is grappling with a different problem: too many other people seem eager to buy them.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特的 PacifiCorp 现在面临 300 亿美元的火灾索赔要求
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s PacifiCorp now faces a demand for $30 billion from victims of Oregon’s 2020 Labor Day wildfires, an escalation of a legal onslaught on the largest grid operator in the western US.】

item.title: 健全住院医师和贷款人接近达成债务协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Sound Inpatient Physicians 公司正在与一组债权人进行深入讨论，以达成一项交易，延长这家医院员工招聘公司的第一和第二抵押定期贷款的到期日，从而帮助避免现金紧缩。【原文：Sound Inpatient Physicians Inc. is in advanced discussions with a group of creditors for a deal that would extend the maturities of the hospital staffing firm’s first- and second-lien term loans to help stave off a cash crunch, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 魏斯多策略对冲基金在关闭后申请破产
item.description: Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC 在这家总部位于纽约的投资管理公司宣布结束运营约两个月后申请破产。【原文：Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC filed for bankruptcy about two months after the New York-based investment management firm announced it was winding down operations.】

item.title: 布鲁克斯称，日本的债务困境可能会导致任何外汇干预行动失败
item.description: 在高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：To Robin Brooks, the former chief currency strategist at Goldman Sachs Group Inc., Japan’s massive government debt — for now at least — is likely to doom any efforts to prop up the yen.】

item.title: 加密货币复兴后，香港与美国在比特币 ETF 市场展开竞争
item.description: 一批直接投资于加密货币的交易所交易基金将于本周二在香港亮相，这预示着美国比特币产品将面临潜在的竞争。【原文：A batch of exchange-traded funds investing directly in crypto will debut in Hong Kong on Tuesday, heralding potential competition for US Bitcoin products whose popularity stoked a record rally in the digital asset.】

item.title: 可可热潮过后，日本巧克力爱好者将面临贴纸冲击
item.description: 日本是亚洲最大的可可买家之一，今年晚些时候，随着可可价格的空前飙升最终传导到商店，日本的巧克力迷们将面临价格冲击。【原文：Chocolate fans in Japan, among Asia’s biggest cocoa buyers, are heading for a sticker shock later this year as an unprecedented surge in cocoa prices finally filters through to stores.】

item.title: 凯雷为标准航空的首次公开募股或出售挑选摩根大通和摩根士丹利
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is working with JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Morgan Stanley on options for aircraft maintenance services provider StandardAero, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日元交易员认为日本要阻止货币下滑仍需艰苦奋斗
item.description: 货币交易商警告日本政府，鉴于经济力量可能导致日元进一步贬值，日本政府需要反复采取行动来提振陷入困境的日元。【原文：Currency traders warned Japan’s government that it will need to repeatedly act to buoy the beleaguered yen given economic forces likely merit further depreciation.】

item.title: 丰业银行从摩根士丹利聘请 Travis Machen 负责全球银行业务
item.description: Travis Machen 将从摩根士丹利加入丰业银行，领导其全球银行和市场业务。【原文：Travis Machen is joining Bank of Nova Scotia from Morgan Stanley to lead the its global banking and markets business.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称通胀前景面临 "重大风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲中央银行在实现其通胀目标方面面临着巨大的危险，他列举了一些可能使价格向两个方向过度波动的因素。【原文：The European Central Bank faces significant dangers to achieving its inflation goal, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos, who cited factors that could pull prices too far in either direction.】

item.title: BlueBay 称有关日元干预的交易传言 "风险很大
item.description: 在日元剧烈波动和货币干预言论甚嚣尘上之际，加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）并没有对日元抱有任何侥幸心理。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management isn’t taking any chances on the Japanese yen amid its wild gyrations and talk of currency intervention.】

item.title: 芬兰燃料制造商耐斯特开始物色首席执行官，雷姆斯将离职
item.description: 芬兰可再生柴油生产商耐斯特公司（Neste Oyj）将开始物色新的首席执行官，因为马蒂-莱穆斯（Matti Lehmus）在担任该职务仅两年后就卸任了。【原文：Neste Oyj, the Finnish maker of renewable diesel, will begin a search for a new chief executive officer as Matti Lehmus steps down after just two years in the role.】

item.title: 特鲁多削减外国留学生工作时间以缩减项目规模
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府将把外国留学生每周可在校外工作的时间减少到 24 小时，这也是政府遏制该项目爆炸式增长的努力之一。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government will cut the amount of time foreign students can work off campus to 24 hours per week, part of its effort to curb the explosive growth of the program.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利最糟糕的墨西哥情景：比索下跌 11
item.description: 摩根士丹利认为，如果墨西哥下届政府和国会通过一项破坏体制的非正统议程，"超级比索 "可能会大幅下跌。【原文：The “super peso” could fall sharply if Mexico’s next government and congress adopt an unorthodox agenda that undermines institutions, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 嘉能可顶级股东赞成保留煤炭而非分拆上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Glencore Plc 的几位最大股东认为，该公司应保留其煤炭资产，这使得拟议中的分拆上市成为疑问。【原文：Several of Glencore Plc’s largest shareholders believe that the company should retain its coal assets, according to people familiar with the matter, throwing a proposed spinoff into doubt.】

item.title: 阿根廷大豆压榨机罢工正值收获季节
item.description: 阿根廷大豆加工厂的工人在农民收割庄稼时举行了罢工。【原文：Workers in Argentine soy-processing plants have gone on strike just as farmers are collecting the crop.】

item.title: 资深交易员迈斯纳一年后退出特洛特精品店
item.description: 据知情人士透露，资深投资银行家克里斯蒂安-迈斯纳（Christian Meissner）在加入由高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Veteran investment banker Christian Meissner is leaving BDT & MSD Partners about a year after joining the advisory and private equity firm run by two former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. bankers, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 迈阿密办公大楼以超过 5 亿美元的价格出售
item.description: Nuveen Real Estate 正在寻求出售位于迈阿密布里克尔中心地带的一栋办公楼，该办公楼的租户包括美国银行和阿波罗全球管理公司。【原文：Nuveen Real Estate is seeking to sell a Miami office building located in the heart of the Brickell neighborhood with tenants including Bank of America Corp. and Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 结告诉《日经新闻》，欧洲央行在可能于 6 月降息后必须保持谨慎
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，欧洲央行在 6 月份可能首次降息后应谨慎行事，季度工资数据可能是决定进一步举措的关键。【原文：The European Central Bank should proceed with caution after a probable first reduction in interest rates in June, with quarterly data on wages likely to be key in determining further moves, according to Governing Council member Klaas Knot.】
